hook.text: Red Bull didn't enter the soft drink market. It invented the energy drink category.

buildup.text: Competing in an existing category means fighting for market share against giants.

discovery.text: Creating a new category lets you define the rules, set the standard, and lead from day one.

twist.text: The risk is enormous. If the category doesn't stick, you've built a kingdom with no subjects.

climax.text: Salesforce created cloud CRM. Airbnb created home-sharing. Category creators rewrite markets.

punchline.text: Don't fight for the crown. Build a new kingdom.

quiz.question: What advantage does category creation give a brand?
options: It lets you define the rules and lead from day one
It requires less investment than entering existing markets
